schema.prompt:
Generate diverse content formats from the provided materials:

Thematic Content: {{input.thematicContent}}
Social Posts: {{input.socialPosts}}
Email Content: {{input.emailContent}}
Blog Content: {{input.blogContent}}
Presentation Content: {{input.presentationContent}}

Create multiple content formats:

1. Short-Form Content (Under 100 words):
   - Tweet threads (numbered)
   - Instagram captions
   - LinkedIn status updates
   - YouTube Shorts scripts
   - Quick tips/hacks
   - Quote graphics text
   - Micro-blog posts

2. Medium-Form Content (100-500 words):
   - Newsletter articles
   - Blog post excerpts
   - LinkedIn articles
   - Medium articles
   - Email sequences
   - Product descriptions
   - Press releases

3. Long-Form Content (500+ words):
   - Comprehensive guides
   - White papers
   - Case studies
   - Research reports
   - Ebook chapters
   - Course outlines
   - Detailed tutorials

4. Visual Content Text:
   - Infographic copy
   - Slide deck content
   - Video script text
   - Podcast show notes
   - Chart descriptions
   - Diagram labels
   - Visual storytelling

5. Interactive Content:
   - Quiz questions
   - Poll options
   - Survey forms
   - Workshop outlines
   - Discussion prompts
   - Challenge descriptions
   - Checklist items

6. Repurposing Variations:
   - Different angles
   - Various audiences
   - Multiple perspectives
   - Seasonal adaptations
   - Trend connections
   - Industry focuses
   - Problem-solution pairs

7. Content Series Ideas:
   - Multi-part articles
   - Weekly themes
   - Educational sequences
   - Story continuations
   - Progressive reveals
   - Building complexity
   - Audience journeys

Return as structured JSON with keys: shortFormContent (array by type), mediumFormContent (array by type), longFormContent (array by type), visualContent (array), interactiveContent (array), repurposingVariations (array), contentSeries (array with episode ideas).
